trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Woo ga naŋ war ma biyey zaa k'i zijandi.

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: Interneti nungey kaŋ war g'i naaru ga hin ka war gorodogoo hãa.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Woo nda war ga widewo zaa k'a zijandi.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Woo nda war ga biyey gaabu nd'i zijandi.

trans-unit.note: Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla ma %@ tee. Ir anniya ti ka interneti baanoo nda feeriyanoo sahãndi.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Search and browse right in the app
trans-unit.target: Ceeci nda naaru porogaramoo hunday ra
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block trackers (or update settings to allow trackers)
trans-unit.target: Ganakey gagay (wala kayandiyaney taagandi ka ganakey noo fondo)
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history
trans-unit.target: Tuusu ka aleewa tuusu, ceeci nda naaruyan taariki da kaa
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a private browser:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.target: Ganakey gagay ka war suturaa tonton

trans-unit.source: Block Web fonts to reduce page size
trans-unit.target: Interneti šigira gagay ka moɲoo kaccandi

trans-unit.source: Automatically block online trackers while you browse. Then tap to erase visited pages, searches, cookies and passwords from your device.
trans-unit.target: Ga interneti ganakey gagay nda boŋse waati kaŋ war ga naaru. Adiši karkar ka moo gunantey, ceeciyaney, aleewawey nda šennikufaley tuusu war jinaa ga.
trans-unit.note: Message label on the first run screen

trans-unit.target: Naaru sanda boro kul šii ma guna.

trans-unit.source: Tap Safari, then select Content Blockers
trans-unit.target: Safari karkar, de ma gundekuna gagaykey suuba

trans-unit.source: Blocking other content trackers may break some videos and Web pages.
trans-unit.target: Gundekuna tana ganakey gagayyan ga hin widewo nda interneti moo fooyaŋ kayri.

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Firefox but doesn’t have it installed. This string will not wrap in the interface. Instead, it will truncate. To prevent this, please keep the localized string to 18 or fewer characters. If your string runs longer than 18 characters, you can use 'Get Firefox' as the basis for your string. However, if at all possible, we’d like to signal to the user that they will be going to the App Store and installing the application from there. That is why we are using Get and App in the en-US string.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Focus.
Label for cancel button shown when entering a URL or search
Text for the URL context menu when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.
Erase button in the URL bar

trans-unit.source: Your browsing history has been erased.
trans-unit.target: War naaruyan taarikoo n' ka tuusandi.

Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy an image after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy a link after long pressing it.

Text for the context menu when a user wants to share a link after long pressing it.
Dialog title used for opening an external app from Focus. First placeholder string is the app name of either Focus or Klar and the second placeholder string specifies the app it wants to open.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save images to your Camera Roll
